docs.lead_paragraph: There is a great deal of rottenness in Bellevue Hospital-there can be no mistake about that. Whether the Ten Governors are principally blameable, or the House physicians and surgeons, or the public which allows what should be a noble charity to be abused ," shamefully "-it is not now the time to say.

headline.main: THE CANADA'S MAILS,; Annual Trade Reviews. FRENCH LOAN. An Autograph Letter from the Queen. THE CZAR'S LAST MANIFESTO. LORD RAGLAN AND THE LONDON TIMES. BITTER CONTROVERSY. INEFFICIENCY OF THE ARMY IN THE CRIMEA RESIGNATION OF GEN. DE LACY EVANS VIEWS OF OUR OWN CORRECPONDENT. VIENNA MOVEMENTS. New-York Daily Times. THE CANADA'S MAILS

docs.lead_paragraph: The new year is already five days old, and people are nearly done committing anachronisms in misdating their letters. However, we have to do still with matters from the late year, and our news from the Crimea has yet only reached Christmas day, which, according to the Times, was to witness the beginning of a 48 hours' bombardment.

docs.lead_paragraph: Presentment of the Grand Jury. UNITED STATES CIRCUIT COURT.--JAN. 20. Before Judge Betts. The Grand Jury of the Circuit Court also came into-Court this morning and brought their presentment in reference to the loss of the steamer Arctic and the ship New Era, which has been looked for for a long time back.
